DOC.brief_summary: To compare efficiency surgical procedure use 2 phaco tip design torsional phacoemulsification use bevel-down technique .
DOC.brief_title: Parameters 2 Phaco Tips Designs Torsional Phacoemulsification
DOC.detailed_description: In prospective , comparative , mask study , patient randomly assign torsional coaxial microincision cataract surgery use either mini-flared 45-degree Kelman tip reverse mini-flared 30-degree Kelman tip . Clinical measurement include preoperative 3-month postoperative correct distance visual acuity ( CDVA ) , endothelial cell count ( ECC ) preoperative 1-day postoperative central corneal thickness ( CCT ) . Intraoperative measurement include phaco time , torsional time , aspiration time , case time , cumulative dissipate energy ( CDE ) balance salt solution volume ( BSS ) . The study perform accord establish ethical standard clinical research Institutional Review Board ( IRB ) University Sao Paulo Brazil , conduct November 2010 February 2011 . All surgery perform University Sao Paulo . Physicians conduct postoperative evaluation access patient ' medical record . Exclusion criterion previous ocular surgery , central endothelial cell count less 2000 cells/mm2 , glaucoma intraocular pressure great 21 mmHg , amblyopia , retinal abnormality , steroid immunosuppressive treatment connective tissue disease . Enrolled patient complicate cataract surgery ( eg , posterior capsule rupture , vitreous loss , intraocular lens place capsular bag ) subsequently exclude .
DOC.criteria: Patients older 40 year agerelated cataract , normal ophthalmologic examination besides senile cataract . Previous ocular surgery , central endothelial cell count less 2000 cells/mm2 , glaucoma intraocular pressure great 21 mmHg , amblyopia , retinal abnormality , steroid immunosuppressive treatment , connective tissue disease , allergy hypersensitivity NSAIDs . Enrolled patient complicate cataract surgery ( eg , posterior capsule rupture , vitreous loss , intraocular lens place capsular bag ) subsequently exclude
